thread.title: Chris Coleman reveals he almost walked away from Wales (PFA - Professional Footballers' Association)
thread.title_full: Chris Coleman reveals he almost walked away from Wales (PFA - Professional Footballers' Association) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Chris Coleman reveals he almost walked away from Wales (PFA - Professional Footballers' Association)
text: ( Source : PFA - Professional Footballers' Association ) Wales manager Chris Coleman has revealed he considered his position after losing 6-1 in Serbia three years ago. Coleman is on the brink of becoming the first Wales manager for 58 years
